SELECT /* channel_SQL.detail */ CH_CD ,CH_NM ,CH_KIND_CD ,CH_NO ,RATIO_CD ,SORT_NO ,PAYFREE_YN ,HD_YN ,DEL_YN FROM TCM_CHANNEL WHERE 1=1 AND CH_CD = #{s_ch_cd}

SELECT /* channel_SQL.channel_image_list*/ A.CODE ,A.CODE_NAME ,B.WEB_URL ,B.INS_DT ,B.UPD_DT FROM JWORK_CODE A LEFT OUTER JOIN TCM_IMG B ON A.CODE = B.IMG_SECT1_CD AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.IMG_GUBUN_CD = 'CAIK0100' AND B.MAST_CD = #{s_ch_cd} WHERE 1=1 AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.CODE_GROUP = 'CAIC' ORDER BY A.CODE_SEQ

SELECT /* channel_SQL.channel_url_list*/ A.CODE ,A.CODE_NAME ,B.BROAD_URL ,B.PREVIEW_URL ,B.AUDIO_ONLY_URL ,B.DEL_YN FROM JWORK_CODE A LEFT outer JOIN TCM_CHANNEL_URL B ON A.CODE = B.SCR_CD AND B.SERV_KEY IN ('023','100','200','523') AND B.CH_CD = #{s_ch_cd} WHERE 1=1 AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.CODE_GROUP = 'CSSD'
